name: Renewable Energy Group, Inc.
description: Renewable Energy Group, Inc. (REG) is a leading provider of cleaner, renewable fuels and a prominent player in the biofuels industry. Founded in 1996 and headquartered in Ames, Iowa, REG has built a strong reputation for its commitment to sustainability and innovation in renewable energy solutions. The company specializes in the production of biodiesel and renewable diesel, which are derived from natural and sustainable feedstocks such as vegetable oils and animal fats. REG operates a network of biorefineries across the United States, utilizing advanced technologies to convert feedstocks into high-quality renewable fuels. With a mission to create a sustainable future, REG plays a pivotal role in reducing greenhouse gas emissions and promoting energy independence. The company not only focuses on fuel production but also provides a range of services, including fuel distribution and logistics, to support its customers in transitioning to greener energy options. As the demand for renewable energy continues to grow, REG remains at the forefront of the industry, actively investing in research and development to enhance fuel efficiency and expand its product offerings. With a vision of a cleaner, more sustainable world, Renewable Energy Group is dedicated to leading the charge towards a more sustainable energy landscape.

seo.meta_title: Renewable Energy Group, Inc. | Leader in Renewable Fuels
seo.meta_description: Explore Renewable Energy Group, Inc., a leader in the biofuels industry focused on producing cleaner, sustainable fuels and promoting energy independence.

faq.question: What does Renewable Energy Group do?
faq.answer: Renewable Energy Group produces cleaner, renewable fuels such as biodiesel and renewable diesel.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Renewable Energy Group?
faq.answer: Cynthia (Cindy) G. L. R. DeVries is the CEO of Renewable Energy Group, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Renewable Energy Group headquartered?
faq.answer: Renewable Energy Group is headquartered in Ames, Iowa, USA.

faq.question: What are the main products of Renewable Energy Group?
faq.answer: The main products include biodiesel and renewable diesel.

faq.question: When was Renewable Energy Group founded?
faq.answer: Renewable Energy Group was founded in 1996.
